
describe-maintenance-start-time
*******************************


DESCRIPTION
===========

This operation returns your gateway's weekly maintenance start time
including the day and time of the week. Note that values are in terms
of the gateway's time zone.


SYNOPSIS
========

   aws storagegateway describe-maintenance-start-time
     --gateway-arn <value>


REQUIRED PARAMETERS
===================

"--gateway-arn"  (string)


OPTIONAL PARAMETERS
===================

None
